Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
The Chinese department would like to hold a Chinese zodiac (Year of Snake) design competition for Y1 to Y6 students. The winner’s design will be chosen for our CNY Lakefront and Nanhu performance programme bookletand also on our “BSG 2013 Chinese New Year Cards” which will be available during the last week before our CNY holiday at both Reception desks. Please CLICK here for more details.
Regards, Alison Liu Head of Chinese Department
